body:
Hello Players of the AVICUS NETWORK this is a dissuasion about Challenges for me to do in the Nebula Servers my latest ones were A wooden plane in Senex and a Golden Sword in Senex 2 and a mojang symbol and name in Frostbite ( All approved by EmeraldSword85 ) So i ask You Can you please give me challenges so i can do. ( i might record them for evidence or idk fun :3 )

Games I want challenges in
1. Nebula
2. Nexus
3. Avicade ( maybe )
body_tagged:
Hello Players of the AVICUS NETWORK this is a dissuasion about Challenges for me to do in the Nebula Servers my latest ones were A wooden plane in Senex and a Golden Sword in Senex 2 and a mojang symbol and name in Frostbite ( All approved by EmeraldSword85 ) So i ask You Can you please give me challenges so i can do. ( i might record them for evidence or idk fun :3 )

Games I want challenges in
1. Nebula
2. Nexus
3. Avicade ( maybe )
title: DarkArcher810 In Stuff

replies.body: Break all three monuments with your fist, idea from Ducks.
replies.body_tagged: Break all three monuments with your fist, idea from Ducks.

replies.body:
Kill someone with a hoe (diamond, iron, gold [No stone/wood])

Tower up 15 blocks and jump down onto a guy an kill him (no water)
replies.body_tagged:
Kill someone with a hoe (diamond, iron, gold [No stone/wood])

Tower up 15 blocks and jump down onto a guy an kill him (no water)

replies.body:
Found this on the old forums...I remember the thread too :D

Nebula:
Skills:
-Kill someone with a Golden Apple
-Kill a iron guy in hand
-Kill diamond guy in hand
-Shoot someone in 75 blocks or more while he is running
-Shot someone who is afk
-Get a ten kill streak with no armor
-Kill somebody while falling out of the world
-Kill someone who kills you 
-Kill someone with Nebula Shop (VEY HARD!)
-Kill someone with a Steak
-Get every monument on quintus without dieing once (VERY HARD!)
-Kill someone at sametime when he kills you
-Do not fall in the void once
-Kill Funkystudios (Not hard but... :)
-Kill > Samir_14 <  :)
-Build a Nether Portal
-ScreenShot Samir_14
-Screen Shot ObisidianFire99 :)
-Catch a nooby hacker
-Build a scale model of Mount Everest
-Shoot someone with Golden Apple (HOW I DONT KNOW!)
-Had Aether mod and in server go there!
-Play Nebula in TouchScreen mode
-Win nebula doing all things from Nebula:Skills: List!
-Destroy a monument with your fist.(Is dat even possible??) 
-Don't craft! Only use your fist and get the monument only using your fist! 
-Have a Golden apple in your hand all the time! 
-Don't run just walk!
-Kill zaliznyak67 to make him rage to the title screen(EXTREMELY EASY)
-Don't kill no one and walk the rest of the way to get the Monuments! 
-Make sugar-cane in any map
-Make a fully automatic melon farm and feed all your team without some idiot griefing it. 
-mlg  water of the top of the enemy tree in zalidor. 
-Get a 5 kill streak with a stick.
-Build a glass bridge without getting spleefed by you teammates
-Break  the other team's monument, then run back to your own monuments without getting killed and place the other team's obsidian infront of your monument.
-Get the spanky spade. Then go on a rampage with it, getting a 15 killstreak
-Shoot a full iron/diamond guy to death
-Find FightToWin's twin on Castle Adventure (VERY HARD!)
-Break all the monuments in a map without dying.
- Do the one above for EVERY map (VERY HARD!)
-Play Nebula with Render distance tiny!
-Build an Iron Golem near your team's castle in Castle Adventure and keep him from being hit off into the Void by people for 10 minutes. (EXTREMILY HARD/IMPOSSIBLE!)
-Kill anyone with a 360 bow shot! 
-Use the obsidian from the top of the volcano map to surround and protect your obsidian
-Make a 2nd tier beacon on quintus                
-Make a piston (this is possible on only one or two maps)  (VERY HARD!)
